creators.name: Vellutini, Bruno C.
affiliation: Max Planck Institute of Molecular Cell Biology and Genetics

title: 3D Tutorial: Visualization of 3D data in Fiji using built-in tools and the plugin 3Dscript
description: This tutorial shows different approaches to visualize 3D microscopy data in Fiji. It provides a brief introduction to some tools bundled in Fiji such as Orthogonal Views, Volume Viewer, 3D Viewer, and BigDataViewer, and a more in-depth explanation of the plugin 3Dscript.
